at.spengergasse.entities

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.spengergasse.entities.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdvancedEntity, SimpleEntity

    public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    Entities are every moving Object in the game (Player, enemies, shots). The Entity class is the super class of SimpleEntity and AdvancedEntity.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Entity(int sim, int x, int y)
      Constructs a new Entity.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Entity

        public Entity(int sim,
              int x,
              int y)
        Constructs a new Entity.
        Parameters:
        sim - determines whether it is a SimpleEntity (-1) or a AdvancedEntity (1)
        x - the X Coordinate (coordinate origin is the upon left corner)
        y - the Y Coordinate (coordinate origin is the upon left corner)
